title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 402.7 - Refund without certificate of deposit
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 402.7 - Refund without certificate of deposit

State Regulations

Each and every steam corporation holding consumer deposits
shall provide reasonable ways and means, in such manner as such corporation may
elect, whereby a depositor who makes application for the return of his deposit
and is entitled to the return thereof, but who is unable to produce the
original certificate of deposit or receipt, may not be deprived of his
rights. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
402.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
